entry.lex: Guanciale is an ingredient used in the preparation of Amatriciana sauce which is a traditional Italian sauce, that comes from the region of Lazio.
Guanciale is an ingredient in Amatriciana sauce which comes from the Lazio region in Italy.
Amatriciana, a sauce containing Guanciale, is a traditional Italian sauce from the Lazio region.

entry.lex: A dish of Javanese cuisine, Arem arem has compressed rice cooked in banana leaf with vegetables or minced meat fillings.
Arem arem is a Javanese dish and the main ingredients of Arem-arem are compressed rice cooked in banana leaf with vegetables or minced meat fillings.
Tomato, used when making Arrabbiata sauce, is part of the flowering plant division and the Solanaceae family.

An ingredient found in Arrabbiata sauce is the tomato, which belongs to the solanaceae family and is pat of the flowering plant division.
Rome, Italy is where the sauce called arrabbiata is from, it includes olive oil as an ingredient used in it's preparation.
Arrabbiata sauce is made from olive oil and comes from Rome in Italy.
Arrabbiata sauce is a traditional dish from Rome, Italy. Olive oil is one of the ingredients in the sauce.
Tomatoes are found in Arrabbiata sauce, which is a dish from Rome in Italy.
Arrabbiata sauce originates from the region of Rome, Italy, and tomato is one of its ingredients.
